sqlMap.select: select alarm.alarm_cont as cont, alarm.alarm_type as type, alarm.alarm_chk as chk, users.user_pic as sender_pic, sender_id as sender, alarm_no from alarm, users where alarm.user_id = #receiver# and alarm.sender_id = users.user_id order by alarm_no desc
sqlMap.delete: delete from alarm where user_id = #receiver# and sender_id = #sender# and alarm_type = #type#
sqlMap.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_no, user_id, alarm_cont, alarm_type, alarm_date, alarm_chk, sender_id) values(alarm_no_seq.nextval,#receiver#,#cont#,#type#, sysdate, 0, #sender#)
